definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: (= ´[[בַּעַל פ]] ´[[בּ]], cf. sub [[בעל]]) E. of Jordan De 3:29, in land of Amorites De 4:46 cf. Jos 13:20 (where assigned to Reuben); in land of Moab De 34:6. On site cf. Di Nu 23:28 Lag:Onom. 232. 2nd ed. 246 Cond:Heth & Moab 142 f. PEF:1882, 85 f. Tristr:Moab 305.
